transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello? Ji Uttar Dana Softtech se baat kar rahe ho aap?
Customer: Hmm boliye.
Executive: Hello, sir IndiaMART se baat kar rahi hu senior manager aap kaise ho sir?
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Sir aapka ek concern aaya tha mere paas buyleads ko lekar ke.
Executive: Aapne bola tha ki leads abhi aapke paas utna nahi aa raha hai jitna pehle aata tha.
Executive: Yahi main concern tha sir aapka?
Customer: Ha ha ha ha. Wo sab check kijiye kyu aisa ho raha hai. Aur mera mere product se related aana chahiye. Agar customer nahi aayega to phir humko usme problem hogi na?
Executive: Ha ha.
Executive: Kya aapke portal pe aapne 34 product add kar rakhe hain sir? Inhi sab mein aapko leads chahiye na sir?
Customer: Ji ji ji.
Executive: Achcha.
Executive: To abhi aap mujhe batao aap dealing pan India mein karte ho sir? Pure India mein dealing karte ho?
Customer: Ha pura India ka hi hai sir.
Executive: Pura India mein karte ho. Abhi aapke paas ek 14 hours pehle ek requirement aayi thi Uttar Pradesh se. SHG software ke liye.
Customer: Kya cheez ka?
Executive: Ji correct SHG software. Koi accounting software hai sir. Billing aur accounting software ke liye.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Ye to provide karte ho na sir aap?
Customer: Wo customer se baat karne ke baad pata chalega uska requirement kaisa hai.
Executive: Aap baat karega billing software ki requirement aayi hui hai sir. Ek isse pehle ek requirement aayi hui hai Odisha se. Money receipt management software.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Unko bhi kuch accounting aur billing ke liye hi chahiye software.
Customer: Thik hai thik hai.
Executive: Module included likha hua hai inhone billing and invoicing accounting software.
Executive: Inko ye chahiye. Abhi do leads available hai aapke aapke liye. Aap inko ek baar try karo customer aapko kya bolta hai. Iske alawa ek second sir main dekh leti hu leads abhi aajkal kitni generate ho rahi hai hamare paas. Aapko ye problem kab se aa rahi hai sir? Aapko lag raha hai ki leads kam aa rahi hai IndiaMART mein?
Customer: Ye mere khyal se aapka approximate two months ke aas paas se lag raha hai.
Executive: Two months mein aapko lag raha hai. Abhi kyuki aapke jitne bhi categories hai na agar main dekhu mere paas total aapki har ek category mein jo lead aa rahi hai. October mahine mein 726 lead humne aapko provide ki thi. September mein 810 leads hamari site se gayi thi. August mein 916 lead gayi thi sir. Aur November mein abhi tak 386 lead aapke paas ja chuki hai.
Executive: Ye approved buylead hai jo IndiaMART ka portal approve kar raha hai aur wo aapki har ek category mein aa rahi hai aapko aapke portal pe bhi dikhti hongi.
Executive: To leads to sahi aa rahi hai sir aap ye kyu keh rahe hain ki leads kam aa rahi hai aajkal?
Customer: Nahi wo business nahi ho paya. Aapka leads to aaya business nahi ho paya.
Executive: Thik hai aapka business nahi ho pa raha hai.
Customer: Hmm lekin aapka ho sakta hai matlab maximum lead jo hai hamare irrelevant bhi ho jate hain. Thik hai aur kuch lead aise bhi hote hain jo jo aapka false lead bhi hota hai. Customer ek baar bol baat karega bolega ki chahiye phir bolega ki nahi chahiye phir bolega ki nahi mera requirement nahi tha is type ka bhi hota hai cheez.
Executive: Ha thik hai sir thoda sa aap quality improve kijiye aur lead dijiye taki humko business mil sake.
Executive: Main ek baar main ek baar bilkul check kar leti hu sir apni site se. Abhi aapki last lead kab convert hui thi sir?
Customer: Last lead to abhi conversion hua nahi bahut pehle hua tha. Mere khyal se ek mahina two mahine pehle hua tha.
Executive: Do mahine pehle hua tha aur abhi tak kitni lead aapki yaha se convert ho chuki hai IndiaMART se?
Customer: Nahi hota hai bahut hi kam hota hai. Aapka percentage agar calculate karenge.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Ha to point zero one percent hoga.
Executive: Ha nahi wo to thik hai sir aap numbers mein mere ko kuch number bata sakte ho ki 5 10 15 20 kuch lead kitni convert hui hai abhi tak?
Customer: Ji aapke yaha se main tabhi abhi jab se maine start kiya hai tab se abhi tak mein mere paas convert sirf three lead hi hua hai.
Executive: Three deals convert hui hai.
Customer: Hmm baki nahi hua.
Executive: Sir aapko keh raha.
Executive: Service industry mein dealing karte hain na aap to. Yaha pe customer aapko bol raha ho ki hum aapki service lenge thoda time lagega aise karke kuch leads follow up mein chal rahi ho sir aapke?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Aisa kuch hai?
Customer: Ha ha ha ha thik hai thik hai aapka chal rahi hai.
Executive: Achcha chal rahi hai. Thik iske sath sath sir ek second sir aap mere ko thoda time do sir aapne customer care pe call karke concern raise kiya hai mere ko aapse aapse kuch parameters to discuss karne padenge na sir?
Customer: To nahi dekhiye aap service agar service achcha nahi milega humko customer ke sath aapko to humko bolna hi padega na ki aapka service achcha nahi mil raha.
Executive: Thik hai aap us pe thoda improve.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not getting enough relevant buyleads.

- Few leads are irrelevant or false.

- Business not being generated from leads.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed leads are being generated.

- Executive will check lead quality.

- Executive asked for time to discuss parameters.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, lead quality, conversion
